extendedInfo.description: Tick-tock. Beat the clock. Now you can play everybody's favorite word search game on your Android phone.The goal of this game is to find out as many words on the board as possible within the given time.Spell the words by tracing the possible letter cubes in sequence. Remember each subsequent letter cube must be horizontally, vertically or diagonally adjacent to the one before it. The amount of the words to be found is at the bottom of your screen. The size of the letter cube board could be 4x4 or 5x5 (you can change it in the settings page). You can also change the time limit when you feel it too tough.Be sure each word must consist of at least 3 letters on 4X4 board, while the minimum word length is 4 on 5X5 board.

reviews.title: What dictionary are they
reviews.comment: Using?  Alot of the words u pick r not words according to this game. Sad-pad-gas they need to correct this. Otherwise a very good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not work very well. Have to drag finger really slow for it to pick up the letters

reviews.comment: Inconsistant in what \'words\' are allowed . Allows acronyms, but not all acronyms for example. Allows words that are not words etc.

reviews.comment: I like this game. I wish there was a way to see the words you DIDN\'T get though. Overall its a fun game. Thanks!

reviews.comment: I systematicly entered every possible 3-6 letter combination on a 4x4 board and it still said I had only found 12 of 18 total words.

reviews.comment: When you play this game its suppose do be fun an let you use any words u want not just the words they pick

reviews.comment: Calif is not a worf. Neither are about 50% of the so called words in this game....Que IS a word...but that no word games recognize. Go figure.

reviews.comment: What! This is not a word finder this a bunch of letters put together weird and u have to try to make a word. No unistalling now

reviews.comment: LOVE!! That is all.

reviews.title: Addictive, use with sound on
reviews.comment: As others have said, what makes it addictive is looking at list of words missed and wondering how you missed some of those! I went into preferences to extend my time limit. I also turned on the sound which means you know immediately if you reuse a word or try a set of letters that do not form a word.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good little word game

reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game
